post.title: factory unlocked apple iphone 4g 16gb unlocked gsm phone never locked no logo on it
post.content: factory unlocked apple iphone 4g 16gb unlocked gsm phone - never locked - no logo on it. unbranded with good price. http://www.welectronics.com/gsm/appl...ory--16gb.html thank you overseas electronics 2457 w. devon ave. chicago, il 60659, usa 1.773.274.3764, labbek@aol.com 10am-8pm mon-sun
